parameters.name: PathVar
parameters.description: Array of paths and file names of the part documents to which to save the split bodies in this Split feature

parameters.name: FlagVar
parameters.description: Array of booleans indicating whether to consume each corresponding PathVar body; true to remove it from the original part, false to not

parameters.name: BodyOrigin
parameters.description: Array of sketch points, vertices, or reference points indicating the origins of each PathVar body; null elements are also permitted

title: ISplitBodyFeatureData.SetSplitBodies2
description: Edits the current split bodies in this Split feature.
signature:
void SetSplitBodies2( 
   System.Object
PathVar
,
   System.Object
FlagVar
,
   System.Object
BodyOrigin
)

parameters.name: PathVar
parameters.description: Array of paths and file names of the part documents to which to save the split bodies in this Split feature

parameters.name: FlagVar
parameters.description: Array of booleans indicating whether to consume each corresponding PathVar body; true to remove it from the original part, false to not

parameters.name: BodyOrigin
parameters.description: Array of sketch points, vertices, or reference points indicating the origins of each PathVar body; null elements are also permitted

remarks:
Call this method after calling
ISplitBodyFeatureData::GetSplitBodies
or
ISplitBodyFeatureData::IGetSplitBodies
to change which split bodies to include in this Split feature.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
